page.title: 10THE BALLET SCHOOL
page.content: The Ballet School, run by Mrs.Prime was opened in 1977.It uses the old primary school which was built in 1868 When the dancers are sixteen they leave the Ballet School to go on to full time training.Here are some of the professional schools they go to. The Royal Ballet School, the Bush Davies School and the Laine Theatre Arts School.The Ballet School puts on a show every year. On average there are 235 dancers who take part. The dancers take I.S.T.D.and R.A.D Ballet exams and I.S.T.D. tap and modern. Lessons cost 70p for babies, 80p for juniors and Â£1 for seniors. Each year dancing schools compete for medals and cups at the Leigh Festival. Our school always does well in the competitions. There are 238 dancers but only 7 boys. Most of the dancers come from Thorpe Bay.
